sentences.en: He is a practical humanist, who believes in the dignity of mankind.
sentences.cn: 他是个真正的人道主义者，信奉人类的尊严。

sentences.en: His works are characterized by abundant thinking connotation, strong humanist spirit and consonant consciousness.
sentences.cn: 他的作品具有丰富的思想内涵, 浸透着强烈的人道主义精神和调和意识.

sentences.en: Humanist education was based on the study of poetry, grammar, ethicsandrhetoric.
sentences.cn: 人文教育的基础是研究诗歌, 语法, 职业道德和言论.

sentences.en: Humanist insofar as it places the living human body at the centre.
sentences.cn: 这种人本主义,乃是就其把活着的人类的身体置于中心地位而言.

sentences.en: It is better to say Einstein is a great humanist rather than he is silly lovely.
sentences.cn: 与其说爱翁呆得可爱,不如说他是一位伟大的人道主义者.

sentences.en: Network Class is constructed by humanist platform, network organization, specialized guidance and modernized services.
sentences.cn: 网络班由人本化的平台 、 网络化的组织 、 专业化的指导和现代化的服务所构建.

sentences.en: Roughly speaking, a scientific humanist is somebody who believes in science and in humanity but not in God.
sentences.cn: 简单来讲，科学人道主义者是相信科学和人道主义而不相信上帝的人。

sentences.en: The company grasps humanist, the broad natrium is virtuous , collection field one group of outstanding people.
sentences.cn: 公司秉持以人为本,广纳贤良, 汇集业界一批精英.

sentences.en: Vernon said that as he watched the tsunami come ashore, he was unable to divorce the scientist in him from the humanist.
sentences.cn: 弗兰克说，当他观看到海啸逼近的时候，他不能使自己从科学家和人道主义者中脱离出来。

sentences.en: Welcome to Neo Humanist Information Center!
sentences.cn: 欢迎来到[新人道资讯交流]中心!

sentences.en: Xunkes management objective is " humanist, the good faith management, continues to manage. "
sentences.cn: 逊克的经营宗旨是 “ 以人为本, 诚信经营, 持续经营. ”
